job.title: Help Desk Technician
job.description:
Our Client, a national healthcare company is looking for people with outstanding&nbsp;phone/communication skills to work as part of their new digital support team&nbsp;that will assist phlebotomists with any IT issues. You will&nbsp;troubleshoot Level 1 over the phone and&nbsp;occasionally&nbsp;in person as part of a 24x7 call center.&nbsp;There could be some local travel. You must be a US citizen and be able to pass a background check and drug test.&nbsp;&nbsp;Must haves:  - Great Customer Service   
  - Level 1 tech skills   
  - Wants to grow in tech   
  - Able to remotely troubleshoot issues   
  - Possible travel&nbsp;up&nbsp;to&nbsp;25% so&nbsp;&nbsp;must have a vehicle   
  - Remote and Nationwide   
  - Windows 7 and Windows 10 install and troubleshooting   
  - Familiarity with help desk ticketing systems   
  - Familiarity with Active Directory and VPN big +   
  - Network printer installation and configuration   
  - Network printer installation and configuration
